name: Chemistry Club
description:
Chemistry Club is a branding agency that bases their work in chemistry, whether as part of the relationship with their clients, or to mix and match elements to create the right effect on the audience. They believe in creating a successful relationship between themselves and their clients to achieve emotional connections with their products and their target audience.
They work to make people feel something, to create worthy brands, and to build emotional connections between people and companies.
